H0.text: The highest grossing hand-drawn animated film in history is. Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

H1.text: The highest grossing hand-drawn animated film in history is. Bambi

H2.text: The highest grossing hand-drawn animated film in history is. Cinderella

H3.text: The highest grossing hand-drawn animated film in history is. Lionking

A4.text: It remains the highest-grossing hand-drawn animated film.
